website_summaries.verdict: One of the best air filters for compatible vehicles. Offers extra filtration performance due to the unique filter design.
pros: Uses a unique filter design that maximizes the amount of volume used to clean air during normal engine use
When installed on a compatible mount, the filter forms a tight seal to keep air from escaping the filtration process
cons: The filter requires a thicker mount to remain secure while in use

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to put in.
customer_reviews.text: The lip on the edge on some of the filters is real stiff on some of the aftermarket filters, Not this one. This one is nicely supple and fits right over the edge of the box. Nice filter, fit right away....no fighting with this filter....When it's hot outside, that makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Emily SB Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Air Filter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this online because the pricing is better than the local stores and the convenience of having it delivered to my door. Quality of this air filter seems to be better than the Toyota OEM air filter sold from the dealership. Fits the 2012 Toyota Highlander air filter box perfectly. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeFan

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, less than 10 minutes to install.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, seems to be a good material. Edge of the gasket protruded a little bit over the edge of the hinge area but it did not seem to be a problem once tightening down the two bolts. This is on a Toyota Camry. For the price, you can't beat it. AA ++
customer_reviews.author: silverboi

customer_reviews.title: Clear Air Flow
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I installed it on my 2002 Toyota Highlander and has produced great performance. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jeancafel

customer_reviews.title: Drop in fit for 2002 Camry V6
customer_reviews.text: Good material, similar to OEM with tight fit and seals.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Fit 03 Toyota Camry perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fit our 03 Toyota Camry perfectly. Nice replacement and cheaper than autostore prices.
customer_reviews.author: Yearzerrrooo

customer_reviews.title: Quality Is Good
customer_reviews.text: Good perimeter seal and filter media was thick. A little pricy.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard C.

customer_reviews.title: Seems just as good as OEM
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these in my 2004 Sienna for quite some time and think they are just as good as the Toyota filters. And, they cost a whole lot less. In case you are not aware.... it is not as important to keep engine air filters as clean as it once was. Before engine computers, dirty filters increased the engine vacuum thus drawing in more fuel than needed (reduced mileage) but today's engines automatically adjust the fuel to match whatever air its getting. So, a really clean filter is now needed mostly for maximum power not maximum fuel mileage. I can never tell a difference in gas mileage because of a dirty filter.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bushaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reliable brand at a good price, delivered to my door. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: J. Cogswell

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my 2006 Highlander as reported.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry...I am sure this is a fine product, however, it does not fit my 2006 Highlander Hybrid as reported on Amazon's site.
customer_reviews.author: fourringa

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my 06 Sienna
customer_reviews.text: Install was quick and easy. Recommended. Don't waste money getting it "professionally" changed.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 2006 Sienna XLE, no issues. Quality seems as good or better than OEM filter.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A

customer_reviews.title: not as pictured and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Fits fine. not as pictured, has 1/3 the pleats. Is that a big deal? It's an air filter IMO. Price about the same as local discount auto chain. Update: 10/2/13 Ordered again. Still not as pictured. Not as sturdy/rigid as the last one. I'm downgrading it to 3 stars and will order another brand next time because of degraded quality.
customer_reviews.author: David in CA

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: How do you know if one air filter is better or worse than another? No way to tell. It fits just like the OE part and Purolator has been in the filter business forever so I'm confident it's doing exactly what it's supposed to do. At about 1/2 the price of a Toyota brand filter, it's a bargain for the DIYer.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: So easy to change out and save moeney from the service station. Reasonably sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Fits like OE
customer_reviews.text: Fits like OE and does the job at half the price. Definitely buying more for my stock.
customer_reviews.author: Hiblend808

customer_reviews.title: works but not easty
customer_reviews.text: It does technically fit my 2008 Sienna but the rubber lip is thicker than the paper OEM item making the replacement of the housing cover difficult. TIP: disconnect the vacuum tubes prior to removing the housing cover to avoid breaking them.
customer_reviews.author: E. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fast delivery and they fit perfect. Thanks, Dennis
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast delivery and they fit perfect. Thanks, Dennis
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Mastin

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement Air Filter 2003 Toyota Camry LE
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent filter that drops into the Camry LE. It looked identical to the old one and for around $12.00 it is a good buy. Purolator is a very good brand that I trust and if I have an option I will always choose the Purolator over the others.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Decimus Meridius

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love buying my auto parts from amazon - fit perfectly, great price, arrive promptly
customer_reviews.author: MagMan

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE FILTER!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS FILTER!! I wouldn't give this filter even 1 star. I just spent close to an hour trying to put it in my 2005 Camry. The soft rubber perimeter of the filter made it nearly impossible to fit in the filter box. When I finally had it installed the best I could I could not close the box properly. I removed it, put the old filter back in about 2 minutes. Went to an auto parts store, purchased a similar filter to the original and installed it in less than a few minutes. This is a terrible filter!! To the seller, please feel free to refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fishman

customer_reviews.title: Purolator Classic Air Filter
customer_reviews.text: The air filter was a well made and fit like a glove in the housing. I would recommend it to any one that has a 2008 Toyota Camry.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Rozzi Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Beats the price at the dealer and is easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones the dealer sells but a fraction of the cost, and it is easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: ituser

customer_reviews.title: Worst
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit sienna 2005. Worst filter I have ever bought
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has the part number wrong
customer_reviews.text: For my 2007 4-cylinder Camry, this is the wrong filter. It is about an inch too big. But the quality looks great. Too bad I had to return it.

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for Camry OEM Filter
customer_reviews.text: The air filter is a good replacement to the OEM filter for the Toyota Camry but at a much better price.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for 2006 Sienna
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Saved $30 by doing it myself instead of letting dealer do it.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It works for what we needed it for. No complaints - used on 2010 Toyota Highlander - Good buy for price

customer_reviews.title: Right fit for my 2006 Camry
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to change the air filter in my 2006 Camry. It fit perfectly,is great quality, and good price.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This air filter fits perfect in my wife's 2006 Highlander 4 cyl. It has a high quality construction. I will buy another one,
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Guy

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Product as described and shipped as expected. No problems with anything and everything was as expected. Thanks again for the item.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Hill

customer_reviews.title: nice air filter
customer_reviews.text: Purolator filter fits my 2003 2.4L Camry. It has a rubber gasket instead of the thick surrounding OEM paper/fabric gasket. Made in China, but it works and fits.
customer_reviews.author: D. Louie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The filter arrived in time and fit perfect in our minivan. I will definitely be buying these online from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Not 5 stars only because I disagree with the characterization of "I love it"
customer_reviews.text: It fits as promised. Assume it works well because of the brand. The scale would be much more appropriate if it used the semantic tags of Very Poor, Poor, Neither, Good, Very Good. Or, some similar, non-emotion based semantics: Excellent, Very Good, Fair, Poor, Very Poor/Bad
customer_reviews.author: PEDAGOGUE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little bit big than the original, need to trim it, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: wawalmx

customer_reviews.title: Right filter, right price
customer_reviews.text: Dealer wanted waaay to much to install new filter. Found it on Amazon for a lot less. Perfect fit for my gf's 2004 Lexus ES330.
customer_reviews.author: steve101

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This filter is very light-weight and flimsy. It does not seem to be near the quality of the Toyota filter that came with the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect fitment
customer_reviews.text: No problem with Purolator, really, but this does not fit my 2009 camry. I double-checked the Amazon fitment and came up with this filter again. The Purolator website indicates that this filter fits Camrys up to 2006
customer_reviews.author: ted

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit a 2010 Rav4 V6.
customer_reviews.text: Even after reading description thoroughly, this does NOT fit a 2010 Rav4 V6.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: wrong filter. Nothing wrong with the filter just the wrong one.

customer_reviews.title: Does not Fit 2007 Toyota Highlander Hybrid
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item after getting the code from a automotive site and then found the item here. Item received is not the same as pictured on the site and is not the right item I need. The new air filter is 1.5 inches shorter and 1 inch higher then my air box so it wont fit. I will be returning and going to a local auto parts store to get the right filter.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Goddu

product_meta.title: Purolator A35432 Classic Air Filter
product_meta.description: Size:single filterPurolator Classic Air Filter provides protection to help improve performance and fuel efficiency
feature_bullets: Provides high volumes of clean air for efficient operation and reduced engine wear
Purolator air filters use specially treated paper to maximize air flow while trapping harmful dirt
Gaskets provide a tight seal to ensure that only filtered air reaches the engine
Does not void new car warranty
